abstract: The rapper, actress and "Chicago" star hosted a previous talk show, "The Queen Latifah Show," which ran from 1999 to 2001.
snippet: The rapper, actress and "Chicago" star hosted a previous talk show, "The Queen Latifah Show," which ran from 1999 to 2001.

headline.main: Queen Latifah Will Host New Talk Show Planned for 2013
headline.print_headline: Queen Latifah to Host New Talk Show in 2013
